1.title: Twitter Feud

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Vince celebrates his 200TH EPISODE on PodcastOne with the Disco Inferno as the two cover the week in Sports-Entertainment.

2.title: The Restaurant Video

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Vince ABSOLUTELY buries JLane's Restaurant Video, Disco chimes in on Stephanie McMahon's "BAD KIND" of Heat and "Buff" Bagwell being BLACK-BALLED from the WWE,

3.title: Poetic Justice

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Inspired by Bayley's poetry from this last week on RAW, Vince decides to write some poetry of his own dedicated to the Disco Inferno.

4.title: Lazy Lane

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Vince accuses Jeff of being lazy.

5.title: Blue Balls

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: With Jeff taking much of the onslaught, the 2 year working relationship between him and Vince practically EXPLODES in front of your very eyes, and ears, as the Leader of the Brand unloads a barrage of built up frustration.

6.title: Blue Balls 2

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Vince and Disco discuss the monumental fall of Glenn's beloved Falcons, "Lazy" Jeff Lane gives an update on his 11 hour journey where he drove home through several states with BLUE BALLS, WWE TV Viewers vs. Subscribers to Network and more.

7.title: Asexual fans

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Glenn and Jeff discuss asexual wrestling fans, the Josh Mathews Twitter controversy and Shark Boy's top 10 insults directed at Mathews, Kendall Jenner in an nWo shirt, the very strange Emmalina debut and much more.

8.title: Disco vs. Shark Boy

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Shark Boy joins Glenn Gilbertti and Jeff Lane after Glenn was not amused by the tweets that the deep sea predator has been sending to Josh Mathews.

9.title: Casual vs. Niche

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Vince and Disco get in a heated discussion about where the wrestling business currently stands, and where it needs to go.

10.title: Unprofessional Professional

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Topics covered: Sami Zayn's delusional comments about facing Goldberg, the latest on Matt Hardy, wrestling numbers in podcasting and does anybody really care about Big Show vs. Shaq?

5.title: Lucha Underground Returns

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Vince and Jeff discuss the weekly news in wrestling including a psycho Zahra Schrieber fan, Jeff Hardy re-signing with TNA, and lots of Lucha Underground news.

6.title: Gaburick

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: BRAND show host Andre Corbeil joins Vince and Jeff to discuss: Vince reading text that he recently sent to Dixie Carter, Andre totally butchering the pronunciation of John Gaburick's name, television ratings and much more.

7.title: Writers Killed the Business

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Vince, Jeff, and Andre discuss all of the wrestling news for the week, including Jim Cornette's claim that writers have killed the wrestling business.

8.title: Beadle v. Madden

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Vince, Jeff, and Andre discuss ESPN's Michelle Beadle going at it with former WCW announcer Mark Madden on Twitter, Odarg the Great, edited WWE footage, and much more.

9.title: Eight Loads of Andre

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Besides the usual wrestling news and rumors, the cast also discusses Andre having a threesome.

10.title: Leave Sunny Alone

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Vince and Jeff discuss Edge and Christian picking on Sunny, WWE salaries, WWE/TNA/Lucha ratings, Lethal on Russo, Gaburick on TNA's "growth" and the bionic "vagine".

11.title: Dark Times

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Zac Eisenstein of Man Overboard Joins Vince, Jeff and Andre to cover all the latest happenings in the world of sports-entertainment.

12.title: Andre's Late

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Vince Russo and Jeff Lane cover all the news, gossip, and rumors swirling around the sports-entertainment history over the past week. Andre Corbeil joins the conversation late and gets into an hour long debate with both Vince and Jeff.

13.title: Good Worker

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Vince reads Andre an entire list of infractions as Vince decides whether or not the Quirky Canadian is going to make the PodcastOne cut. From there, along with Jeff Lane, the three cover the entire week's worth of wrestling news.

14.title: Slicing and Dicing

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: Vince Russo, Jeff Lane, and Andre Corbeil discuss all the weekly news and rumors (and BS) circulating the world of the IWC including Angelina Love departing TNA, Ric Flair slicing and dicing on ESPN and more.

15.title: Brie Bella Having Babies

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: The guys discuss: "Superstar" Billy Graham's comments on Shane McMahon, Raw rating, Brie Bella having babies, and much more.

16.title: Dungeons and Dragons

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: The three tackle such controversial topics as; Sean Waltman unknowingly ripping into Vince, MVP hired/fired from Lucha Underground, TNA moving shop into a warehouse, plus more.

17.title: Joanie

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: Vince Russo honors his friend Chyna.

18.title: There Must Have Been a Second Spitter

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: Jeff, Andre, and Zac run down all of the weekly news and rumors in the wrestling world including Karen Jarrett reportedly spitting on Melissa Santos, Adam Rose's statement on his WWE suspension, and more.

19.title: Which Title Means More

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: Vince, Andre and Jeff dish out all the dirt and gossip of the week from the world of sports entertainment including-RAW 2.2 rating, TNA wrestlers STILL taking head shots, Ryan Satin joins in for a game of "Shoot or Work" plus more.

20.title: F-Bomb

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: The trio tackle such topics as Lucha Underground's use of the F-Bomb, WWE's Cameron being Cyber-Bullied, and other various topics. Also, Ryan Satin drops by to play "Work or Shoot".

21.title: Disco Buries Everyone

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: Glenn Gilbertti (aka Disco Inferno) joins Vince Russo and Jeff Lane as they cover all the news, dirt, gossip, rumors and hearsay of the week on Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt.

22.title: Jive Talkin'

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: Vince and Jeff cover all the wrestling news, plus Disco Inferno and Shark Boy argue over who ruined their TNA segment Jive Talkin'.

23.title: Viva La Raza

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: Glenn Gilbertti joins Vince and Jeff to discuss the WWE Brand Split, Cody Rhodes ripping WWE writers, plus more. The show then takes a turn as the international superstar Konnan does a run-in and proceeds to destroy Disco's "good name".

24.title: Nose-tradamus

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: Glenn Gilbertti, once again joins Vince and Jeff to go over the news in the week of professional wrestling. The topics this week include the Ricochet/Will Ospreay/Vader controversy and much more.

25.title: Above Average

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

25.plot: The run-ins continue, as Glenn brings his mom, and Vince brings "Above Average" Mike Sanders on the show. Oh yeah, Vince, Glenn, and Jeff also run down the weekly news.

26.title: Al Snow Hates Wrestling Fans

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

26.plot: This week's topics include: RAW approaching the MENDOZA LINE in ratings, Stephanie McMahon fudging her purpose as a talent, Billy Corgan-TNA Minority Owner, why Al Snow HATES wrestling fans and more.

27.title: The PopTV One

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

27.plot: Vince, Jeff and Glenn discuss Roman Reigns suspension, the Paige "incident", CM Punk's UFC debut, plus Vince drops a bombshell about contacting PopTV when they started with TNA in January.

28.title: Responding to Cornette

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

28.plot: After 17 years of being verbally abused on-line by Jim Cornette, Vince Russo finally opens about about Jim's decade and a half of hatred towards him-and the truth behind it.

29.title: The Final Deletion

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

29.plot: Vince Russo, Jeff Lane and Glenn Gilbertti (Disco Inferno) welcome Vince's former writing partner Ed Ferrara, as the Fearsome Foursome interview Jeremy Borash.

30.title: Marks

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

30.plot: Vince, Glenn, and Jeff discuss the meaning of the term "marks", Eric Bischoff's comments on The Ross Report, and much more.

31.title: The Final Deletion 2

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

31.plot: Disco Inferno calls for an intervention of Vince's ex-writing partner, Ed Ferrara, claiming that Ed has been "brainwashed" by the IWC.

32.title: Fine, It's Gilbertti

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

32.plot: Vince apologizes to Disco Inferno for mispronouncing and spelling his last name incorrectly for the past 16 years. Russo then turns to his beloved BRAND to find a new "moniker" for GIL-BERT-TI plus much more.

33.title: Format? What Format?

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

33.plot: Vince, Jeff, and Glenn try to discuss the news of the week, but the format gets thrown out the window.

34.title: Royalties

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

34.plot: Disco, Vince and Jeff tackle the hard topics such as: Seth Rollins deeming himself a "hero", Joey Styles' release from WWE, Stone Cold challenging Dean Ambrose, Buff suing the WWE and Queen Stephanie being her self-serving self and more.

35.title: Sell Out

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

35.plot: Vince accuses Glenn of selling out to the WWE Universe, and Glenn accuses Vince and Jeff of being children.

36.title: Smug & Salty

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

36.plot: The crew argue over such topics as Glenn being "smug", Vince's "salty" language of late, Jericho-Lesnar, Hart-Rollins, Rock-Diesel, Eva Marie suspension, Mick ripping same WWE fans that Triple H puts over and more.

37.title: Channel 266

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

37.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

38.title: Punch or Forearm

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

38.plot: Rocky Mountain Pro owner Matt Yaden does a run-in on Glenn Gilbertti.

39.title: Genius IQ

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

39.plot: Vince, Glenn, and Jeff discuss all the wrestling news and rumors from the week, plus Vince issues a challenge to Glenn's IQ.

40.title: Niche Market

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

40.plot: Vince lays out the reason why he believes WWE made the decision to cater to a "niche" market of wrestling fans, Disco explains the reason why Billy Corgan is interested in buying TNA plus more.

41.title: New Rules

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

41.plot: Vince, Disco and Jeff discuss the future of TNA-does it make sense for a company to invest even MORE MONEY into the struggling brand, Vince's NEW SET of wrestling rules for 2016, and Disco's review of Rocky Mountain Pro.

42.title: Gilbernetti & Macaroni

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

42.plot: Glenn Gilbertti, Jeff Lane, and special guest Titus Machiavelli (RMP C.E.O.) discuss the rumor of Sasha/Charlotte in Hell in a Cell, more false TNA news, Goldberg/Brock, and more.

43.title: Free Ballin'

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

43.plot: Donald Trump's "locker room" banter, Glenn's call to Dave Meltzer, Paige's 2nd suspension, the Hitman's burial of the FreeBirds, the ULTIMATE DELETION at the Hardy Compound, and more.

44.title: Keep on Trollin'

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

44.plot: further insights are discussed concerning what may actually be going on behind the scenes at TNA, WWE bringing back superstars to pop some numbers, trolls costing a talent their job and opportunity, and more.

45.title: Gilbernetti & Macaroni II

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

45.plot: Jeff Lane, Glenn Gilbertti, and Rocky Mountain Pro C.E.O. Titus Machiavelli discuss all the news and rumors of the week including the unsealed documents from Billy Corgan's lawsuit against TNA and more.

46.title: Gilbernetti & Macaroni III

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

46.plot: Disco, Titus, and Jeff discuss TNA losing a major TV deal and more.

47.title: The Burial of Jeff Lane

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

47.plot: With Jeff Lane in route to Colorado for Rocky Mountain Pro, Vince goes solo with the Disco Inferno for the first time, and goes NOSE-to-NOSE with him as he explains why he had to edit some of his remarks from last week's show.

48.title: Potatoes

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

48.plot: With little news this week, Vince and Disco cover various topics that Vince has been wanting to put on the table for awhile.

49.title: Wine & Weed

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

49.plot: Even though Thanksgiving is now behind us, the TURKEY, Glenn Gilbertti, aka Disco Inferno, comes back in FULL force as he, together with Jeff and Vince discuss what's going on in the world.

50.title: What Does Disco Do?

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

50.plot: With Jeff BACK in route to Colorado for a Rocky Mountain Pro Show-wait until you see what Vince has to say about that-Vince and Disco debate an array of topics.

51.title: Deletion

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

51.plot: Jeff moderates as Disco and Vince discuss Total Nonstop Deletion and more.

52.title: 38 and Single

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

52.plot: Once again, with little happening in the world of wrestling, the conversation leads to Jeff Lane being single in his mid-to-late thirties.

53.title: Disco the Bully

episode of.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (TV Series 2015– )

53.plot: After giving diet/exercise and parenting tips, Disco is accused of being a Bully by Vince .

imdb.title: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt
akas: Lions, Tigers, Bears and Dirt (United States)
plot: Arguably the most successful writer in the history of professional wrestling, Vince Russo discusses the weekly news and rumors circulating in the wrestling world with his co-host Jeff Lane.
